Uses of Interface
nl.tno.sensorstorm.api.processing.Operation

  • Packages that use Operation 
    Package Description
    nl.tno.sensorstorm.api.processing
    This package contains interfaces for components that can process DataParticels (Fetchers, Batchers and Operations) and MetaParticles (MetaParticleHandler).
    nl.tno.sensorstorm.gracefullshutdown
    This package contains the gracefull shutdown functionality.
    nl.tno.sensorstorm.impl
    This package contains classes are used internally for SensorStorm.
    nl.tno.sensorstorm.storm
    This package contains classes that can be used in storm: the SensorStormSpout, the SensorStormBolt and the custom Stream groupings.
    nl.tno.sensorstorm.timer
    This package contains the timer ffunctionality.

    • Uses of Operation in nl.tno.sensorstorm.api.processing

      Subinterfaces of Operation in nl.tno.sensorstorm.api.processing 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ParticleBatchOperation
      A ParticleBatchOperation performs the processing of particles in a DataParticleBatch, which is produced by a Batcher.
      interface  SingleParticleOperation
      A SingleParticleOperation performs the processing of individual DataParticles.
      Methods in nl.tno.sensorstorm.api.processing with parameters of type Operation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MetaParticleHandler.init(Operation operation)
      Initialize the metaParticle handler connected to the passed operation.
